attributes.action: Make the microchipping of domestic pets a legal requirement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there have been many discussions about making microchipping a legal requirement,well now we have the chance to be heard.
the arguments for are compelling with more and more pets in the UK, finding your pet when lost,finding the owners of abused,neglected pet,being able to keep a register of animals (pets)are a few.
The only argument against as far as I can see is the cost which could be bought down due to numbers being done this would have to be done from a set date and any pets not already done given dispensation.
